name: ADXERS
description:
Hi,

I wrote this game for fun in my very spare time between the ages of 16-18. I did it to learn how to program video games but I thought I'd release it. Don't expect too much.

Source code: https://bitbucket.org/errorc2146/adx-e.r.s
